oba miladi ganna miris kudu pilibanda sakayak athnam eya oba pradeshaye gam palathe sitina langama saukhya niladhariyatala aahara parikshakawarayatala mahajana saukhya parikshakawarayata paminili karannaga ewita ee aya pamina ema sthanayen sampal gena mudra thaba awashya nithimaya kriyamarga ganu labanawa athagaapa aaharayata ekkara ganna kulubadu athara wiyali miris pradhana wega miris karal lesath kali miris lesath miris kudu lesath wiyali miris aahara sakasime kriyawaliyedi apa prayojanayata ganu labayiga wiwidha aahara sakasimedi bhawithayata ganena mema miris karal ho pakat karana lada miris kudula kali miris welendapolen miladi ganimedi honda thaththwaye pawathi dara ese nam ema honda thaththwaye pawathina miris karal handunaganne kesedara miris kudula kali miris sandaha wenath sanyoga kalawam kara wikunannedara eewa soya ganne kesedara yanna mewara api kathabahata lak kalemugasamanyayenla hondin pasimen anathuruwa nela wiyalagath wiyali miriswala pahadili rathu pahayak daknata labeyiga miris warga anuwa dumbauru pahayata huru rathu pahayak ho miris aswanna nela welimata lak karana kramaya anuwa da miris rathu ho dumbauru pahayata huru rathu warnayata lak weyiga kohoma namuth honda miris karal hamawitama dipthimath swabhawayak usulana athara natta sahitha thani diga karalak lesa daknata labeyiga samanyayen welendapolen wiyali miris karal miladi ganna wita nati kadi giyalamadin kadi giyala awarnala pengi giya miris karal bhawithayata nogatha yuthuyiga eewa bohowita kal ikuth wu ho pus warga bardunu miris karal wiya hakiyiga samanyayen miris karal hondin mora aswanna nelimen pasuwa wela wiyali miris bawata path kala wita miris karala namu wita dekata kadimakata lak nowega adena sulu dipthimath swabhawayakin yuktha wega elesama dipthimath lesa miris karala disawannela miris karale pita stharayata yatin jadadathathara dhadatha thanpath wi thibima nisayiga namuth parana wu miris karal thula meya daknata nolabega madin kadi yamakata lak wega thawada miris karala namu wita pahasuwen kadi gos ehi athulatha pus warga saha miris ata sahitha daraya kalu patin dis we nam ee miris karal da paribhojanayata nusudusu wega manda honda thaththwaye aluth miris karal lehesiyen dekata kadimata nohaki bawiniga honda wiyali miris karalak samanyayen sentimitar 4kata ho eeta aasanna pramanayaka digak ganu labayiganomeru miris karal wela wiwidha dayi warga kalawam kara welandapolata ewana awastha da ada ematawa thibega nomeru miris karal miris kudu bawata path kala wita ee thulin niyama sarala warnayala rasa daknata nolabega warthamana welendapole me thaththwaya wadi washayen daknata nolabuna da samahara gagagaga welerdun mudal ipayime paramarthayen wiwidha aakaraye dayi warga mishra kara mema miris kudu kara ho kali miris lesa welandapolata ewimata katayuthu karana awastha athagamema miris sandaha dayi warga yodanawada yana karanaya soya ganima rasayanagara parikshana mangin kala haki athara miris karal wathurata damu wita wathure patak sedi yayi nam eya dayi damu awasthawak wiya hakiyiga elesama wadi washayenma miris karal kudu kara wikinimedi eewa wiwidhakaraye bala kirimwalata da lak kirima sidu wega samanyayen miris kudu sandaha bahulawama lunula pitila wali kalawam kirima sidu wega eyata hethuwa miris kuduwala bara wadi kara wikuna mudal ipayime paramarthayayiga samanyayen miris kudu miladi ganimedi miris tikak angillen gena rasa balimen miris kudu samanga lunu kalawam kara athdayi sakahara danagatha hakiyiga emenma pitila wali kalawam kara athdayi dana ganimata anwikshaya bhawitha kara sidu karana parikshana wadagath
